about_the_game:
Driven by curiosity and a refusal to believe in the myth of the mysterious faceless creature, you venture into eerie, abandoned locations to uncover the truth. But what starts as a thrill-seeking adventure soon spirals into a nightmare as the legend proves horrifyingly real.

Team up with a friend or face the horrors alone. Work together to explore dark environments, find the drawings, burn them, and evade the mysterious faceless creature as he hunts you in real time. Will you make it out alive together, or will fear tear you apart?

Explore hauntingly detailed locations, from a overgrown forest to a derelict factory. Each area is filled with eerie sounds, unsettling visuals, and environmental storytelling that will send shivers down your spine.

The mysterious faceless creature isn’t just a passive observer — he adapts to your actions. Stay too long in one place, and he’ll find you. Keep moving, but don’t lose track of your objectives, or you’ll fall prey to his relentless pursuit.

Piece together the dark mystery behind the legend. Collect notes scattered throughout the world to learn why the mysterious faceless creature exists — and why you might be his next victim.

Tension builds as resources are scarce, and hiding spots are never guaranteed. Every decision matters, and one wrong move could mean the difference between life and death.

Are you ready to put your skepticism to the test? The truth lies within the darkness, but so does the danger. Gather your courage, grab your flashlight, and prepare to face your fears.

short_description: What begins as a myth-busting adventure quickly turns into a terrifying fight for survival when the mysterious faceless creature reveals himself to be real. Explore, survive and uncover the truth in this 1-2 player co-op horror experience.
